name: Ascend (itch) (Phearo)
description:
This Vertical 2D Platformer was made during my first year at LSBU Game Design and Development. This is the first game me and my team ever made so any feedback is welcome. 

Goal of the game: Collect all 3 orbs in each level while escaping the rising lava that is about to swallow you. If you have all 3 orbs collected you can go through the portal at the very top of the level and advance onto the next level. There are 6 levels (two lava, two poison and two ice levels).

The controls: A and D to move and SPACE to jump. You can double jump and wall jump also.

Hope you have fun let me know if you completed it :)
